configurations.name: LaceworkConfig
configurations.value:
{
    "name": "LaceworkConfiguration",
     "policyID": "LW_S3_3",
    "violationdescription": "Ensure the S3 bucket ACL does not grant Everyone READ_ACP permission",
    "eventuuid": "7e4ae132-a4e4-49dd-8aaa-9e672b3abd17",
    "reportuuid": "366c29cf-475c-4596-9561-ba8c15efbf0e",
    "dotheremediationviacli": "false",
    "dotheremediationviaobject": "false",
    "sendslackmessagesforignored": "true",
      "bucketIgnoreList":[
        "arn:aws:s3:::mybucket01",
        "arn:aws:s3:::mybucket02",
        "arn:aws:s3:::mybucket03"
    ],
    "awsaccountid": "123456789012",
    "putbuckettagging": "true",
    "tagname": "LW_S3_3",
    "tagvalue": "suppressed",
    "autoremediationonlyfornewviolations": "false"
}
